attributes.action: Set Up a Pump Watch, Address issues of Double Taxing on fuel transactions.
attributes.additional_details:
We want the following actions:
1.Set up a Pump Watch to stop Oil companies Profiteering.
2.Stop Double-Taxing. Adding Fuel duty + 20% VAT is a rip off, remove VAT or Lower Fuel duty.
3.Address the 'post code lottery' of petrol prices
attributes.background:
The UK Fuel industry needs a huge overhaul
For far too long the motorist has been taken for a ride.

Theresa May herself has described cars as a necessity, not a luxury, for ordinary working families.

High Petrol Prices are bad for business and damage the economy
